name: @diazstg/memory-bank-mcp
description: MCP Server for managing Memory Bank — HTTP+Postgres+Redis variant (branch-only, not for npm publish)

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun build src/index.ts --outdir build --target node
scripts.build:start: bun run build && bun run start
scripts.build:ext: cd vscode-extension && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.test: bun test && bun test src/__tests__/server/apiKeyAuth.test.ts src/__tests__/server/httpTransportServer.test.ts src/__tests__/server/kgContextTools.test.ts src/__tests__/server/rateLimiter.test.ts src/__tests__/server/redisResilience.test.ts src/__tests__/server/thinkingTools.test.ts src/__tests__/server/transportSecurity.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/databaseManagerRls.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/postgresFileSystem.test.ts src/__tests__/storage/rlsIsolation.test.ts
scripts.test:all: bun test && bun test $(find src/__tests__ -path '*/server/*.test.ts' -o -path '*/storage/*.test.ts' | sort | tr '\n' ' ')
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo '❌ ERROR: This branch (feature/http-postgres-redis-supabase) must NOT be published to npm. Use Docker instead.' && exit 1
scripts.release:push: echo '❌ ERROR: Do not push releases from this branch to main.' && exit 1

author: Daniel Diaz Santiago (diaz3618)
